Header: 17 injured as tractor topples in Ampara
Content: Seventeen people have been injured after a tractor had toppled in Pottuvil, Ampara. According to police, the people were a group of devotees from Madugama area in Siyambalanduwa. The injured persons have been admitted to the Pottuvil Hospital, while four of them were later transferred to the Ampara Hospital for further treatment. Police added that 21 people were travelling on the tractor when this incident occurred.
